name: SpeakerText, Inc.
description: Developer of a human brainpower API (Application Programming Interface) that enables engineers to create tasks and send instructions to humans. The company offers computer programmers a way to use human intelligence in software applications.
one_liner: Developer of a human brainpower API (Application Programming Interface) that enables engineers to create tasks and send instructions to humans. The company offers computer programmers a way to use human intelligence in software applications.
